Animation

Testing:

Test that animations work as described


Animate on appear: should animate immediately after loading the browser

Animate on hover: should animate immediately when hovering the element

Animate on click: should animate immediately when clicking the element

Animate on trigger: Animations fire when an external script triggers the event. In the carousel to the left, every time you navigate to a next or previous slide, the slide that comes into view will trigger the start animation: FlipInX.

When the slide goes out of view the image will animate with fadeOut, which is neccessary for the animation to work again when the slide repeatedly comes into view.

User Login Form

To the editor user this should render as an empty block container (because you are already logged in). To anonymous users it should show the login form, and it should be tested to work without errors or warnings.

Admin menu block

The recent content admin block, or any block, will bypass access controls and show to the user. Glazed Builder editor users therefore have the power to expose private content to anonymous users.

In our next major release we will force access control on all Glazed Builder elements, which makes more sense to Enterprise clients who value finegrained access control over ease of use.
